description: The latin name of the test species.

allowed_values: One of EC05 to EC55, IC05 to IC55, LC05 to LC55, LOEC, LOEL, MATC,  MCIG, NOEL, or NOEC

description: The lifestage of the species during the test.
A simplified lifestage that is based on the lifestage.
allowed_values: One of els, adult, or juvenile

description: Contaminant concentration that corresponds to the endpoint in mg/L.
The number of hours the species was exposed to the chemical in hours.

allowed_values: One of invertebrate, amphibian, algae, fish or plant

description: Identification of salmonids and planktonic invertebrates. If neither of these, listed as “other”.
allowed_values: One of planktonic invertebrate,  salmonid or other

description: Species is present in British Columbia if entry is TRUE.
